Dependency=ASHRAE IECC Climate Zone 2004: # Description: The magnitude of cooling setpoint offset.
# Source: Constructed using U.S. EIA 2009 Residential Energy Consumption Survey (RECS) microdata.
# Assumption: RECS data is queried from two building type groups: 1) Single-Family Detached and Mobile Homes and 2) Single-Family Attached, Multi-family with 2-4 Units, and Multi-Family with 5+ Units
# Assumption: Dependencies with sample sizes < 10 used the combined data for both multifamily and single-family homes
